CreditLine: Acquired by William T. or Henry Walters
Description: An incisor tooth is mounted by a gold chain to the bead head of this gold pin. The shaft of the pin is twisted.

Exhibitions.Textblock: Jewelry - Ancient to Modern. The Walters Art Gallery, Baltimore. 1979-1980.
